title: HACK4CHANGE
subtitle: Moncton's Inaugural Civic Tech Hackathon
tagline: Build Technology That Actually Gets Deployed
subheadline: Join developers, designers, and problem-solvers for a three-day hackathon addressing a real challenge from the Greater Moncton Homelessness Steering Committee. Unlike typical hackathons where projects die after the weekend, the winning solution will be fully developed and deployed to serve community organizations across Southeast New Brunswick.

realWorldImpact.title: REAL-WORLD IMPACT
realWorldImpact.description: Partner with the Greater Moncton Homelessness Steering Committee to solve an actual resource coordination challenge. Your solution addresses a crisis affecting 511+ individuals in our community.

codeGoesLive.title: YOUR CODE GOES LIVE
codeGoesLive.description: The winning team partners with Civic Tech Moncton to fully develop and deploy your solution. This isn't a competition that ends Sunday‚Äîit's the start of a real project serving real organizations.

prizesRecognition.title: PRIZES + RECOGNITION
prizesRecognition.description: Compete for cash prizes of at least $5,000 plus the pride of seeing your work make measurable community impact. Winners recognized in all ongoing communications about the deployed solution.
